Seriously? These are American values? https://t.co/zQ22qopp4W
@glenmexted @KweenBoda Tell me something I don't know. The worrisome thing is that now the world is being dragged into the shit too.
@afm_ we need someone to do something. Some one with some pull
@afm_ it's the strongest they have opposed anything yet.
@afm_ yeah, he's been late to the game with a lot of things. Almost a no count in many. My rep is Poliquin. :/
@Kikiluscious @helloyarn @rachellake it was here. I'll DM you the statements
@afm_ I'm betting my name is on a list. Shit is only gonna get worse unless some govt stand with us. Disappointed in our reps
@afm_ because they blindly believe the rhetoric they've been told. That refugees make their lives worse. :( We're all targets now
@Kikiluscious @helloyarn @rachellake did you read what she wrote?
@Kikiluscious @helloyarn @rachellake I'm being argued with by someone that thinks it's ok. Omg.
@KweenBoda this isn't the point. I hope you have good evening. I'm not continuing with you
@KweenBoda are you native? If not you're immigrant stock and this could have been your family. Selfish. Mean. Un American. Un Christian
@KweenBoda we've also banned citizens. People that have lives and families here.
@KweenBoda know your facts. Not alternative facts and lies
@KweenBoda if anyone unilaterally banned based on religion, I would be against that action. It's horrific and wrong.
@KweenBoda I'm not anti Trump. I'm pro American and this goes against American constitution and values. It's wrong.
@KweenBoda you mean the no fly list? I disagree with unilaterally banning someone because of religion
@Kikiluscious @helloyarn @rachellake you and me both. Holy Hell. How can anyone think this is ok?
